name: Nike Air Max 270
description: The Nike Air Max 270 delivers visible air under every step with a lightweight and breathable design. It has a large Max Air unit for cushioning and a rubber outsole for durable traction.

name: Adidas Ultraboost 21
description: The Adidas Ultraboost 21 is designed for runners seeking a responsive and comfortable ride. It features an updated Primeknit upper and Boost cushioning for a smooth and energized stride.

name: Vans Old Skool
description: The Vans Old Skool is a classic skate shoe that's been reimagined as a fashion staple. It features a low profile design and the iconic side stripe.

name: Converse Chuck Taylor
description: The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star is a timeless classic that's perfect for any casual outfit. It features a canvas upper and the iconic rubber toe cap.
